armor-ac-effect: Armor effect on AC. Use either a positive value for benefit, or negative value for detriment.
gear-wt-title: Total gear weight. Automatically calculted based on (quantity * weight) of each item in the gear list. Can be overriden.
hp-mod: Hit Point Modifier (per hit die). Automatically calculated when CON is modified. Can be overriden.
maximum-additional-languages: Maximum Additional Languages. Automatically calculted when INT is modified. Can be overriden.
melee-damage-modifier: Melee Damage Modifier. Automatically calculted when STR is modified. Can be overriden.
melee-to-hit-mod: Melee To-Hit Modifier. Automatically calculted when STR is modified. Can be overriden.
missile-to-hit-mod: Missile Weapon To-Hit Bonus/Penalty. Automatically calculted when DEX is modified. Can be overriden.
movesquares-title: Base movement. Calculated automatically, from applying weight modifiers.
name: Name
open-doors-title: Open Doors. Automatically calculted when STR is modified. Can be overriden.
other-ac-effect: Other effect on AC. Use either a positive value for benefit, or negative value for detriment.
reaction-modifier: Reaction modifier. Automatically calculated when CHA is modified. Can be overriden.
roll-attack: Roll attack (to hit and damage rolls). If missile, adds DEX modifier, otherwise adds STR modifier, automatically.
shield-ac-effect: Shielf effect on AC. Use either a positive value for benefit, or negative value for detriment.
total-ac-title: Final AC. Automatically calculted from the DEX, Armor, Shield, Other AC modifiers and the Ascending or Descending choice, but can be overriden.
totalweight-title: Total weight. Automatically calculted based on the weapons and gear weights. Can be overriden.
weaponswt-title: Total weight of weapons. Automatically calculted based on the weight of each item in the weapons list. Can be overriden.
wisdom-plus: Automatically calculated when WIS is modified. Can be overriden.
